title: By the maior whereas divers persons rudely disposed, within this city, have of late years been observed to behave themselves in an uncivil and insolent manner towards persons of quality ...
author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
publisher: Printed by Andrew Clark, Printer to the Honourable City of London,
notes: Other title information from first lines of text.
"Given at Guild-Hall, this Five and Twentieth day of March, 1673. and in the Five and Twentieth Year of His Majesties Reign."
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England).
